meanings.definition: A board game in which players move pieces around a track according to the roll of dice.
meanings.sent1: During the family game night, we enjoyed playing parcheesis.
meanings.sent2: Let's set up the parcheesis board and start the game.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they strategized their moves in parcheesis.
meanings.sent4: The parcheesis pieces danced around the board like little travelers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful parcheesis board made the game exciting and fun.

meanings.definition: To play the board game Parcheesi.
meanings.sent1: We decided to parcheesis after dinner to relax.
meanings.sent2: She loves to parcheesis with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The siblings often parcheesis to settle their arguments.
meanings.sent4: His mind would parcheesis away into the world of the game.
meanings.sent5: Parcheesising together brought them closer as a family.
